solution_line_template: If you buy 18 units, the percentage of the total price drops to {total_percentage}% - {discount_percentage}% = <<{total_percentage}-{discount_percentage}={price_percentage_after_discount}>>{price_percentage_after_discount}%
If {price_percentage_after_discount}% is equal to ${paid_amount}, then {total_percentage}% is equals {total_percentage}%/{price_percentage_after_discount}% * ${paid_amount} = ${original_price}
